text: hananim-ui gippeum-eul ganguhamyeo jaalobuteoui hwagsin-eulosseo jasin-ui jaesan-eul huisahaneun jadeul-ui yeneun eondeog-e issneun jeong-wongwado gat-euni geugeos-i jangdaebileul maj-a geu yeolmaeleul du baelo gajyeoda judeola. geuleona geugeos-i jangdaebileul maj-ji anh-eul ttaeneun guseulbila. hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-i haenghaneun geos-eul bogo gyesineun bun-ila
